Description: Painted wooden figure of Ptah-Sokar-Osiris; the plinth is lost.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth (1906-1907)
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 230)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr David George Hogarth
